name: ionic live-update add
summary: Adds Appflow Live Update plugin to the project
description:
This command adds the Appflow Live Update plugin (`cordova-plugin-ionic`) for both Capacitor and Cordova projects.

For Capacitor projects it runs all the steps necessary to install the plugin, sync with the native projects and add the configuration to the proper iOS and Android configuration files.

For Cordova projects it just takes care of running the proper Cordova CLI command with the submitted parameters.

options.name: channel-name
options.summary: The channel to check for updates from

options.name: update-method
options.summary: The update method that dictates the behavior of the plugin

options.name: max-store
options.summary: The maximum number of downloaded versions to store on the device

options.name: min-background-duration
options.summary: The minimum duration after which the app checks for an update in the background
